summary: This bill, the Southern Nevada Economic Development and Conservation Act, focuses on land management and economic development in Southern Nevada. Key provisions include transferring land to tribal entities, adjusting boundaries of conservation areas, designating wilderness areas, authorizing land conveyances to local governments for public purposes, and establishing off-highway vehicle recreation areas. The bill also addresses flood control and amends existing legislation concerning land management and public land use, particularly in relation to the Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area and the Sloan Canyon National Conservation Area.
